titleStmt.title: The proposal for the raising of the silver coin of England, from 60 pence in the ounce to 75 pence, considered; vvith the consequences thereof.
titleStmt.author: Bohun, Edmund, 1645-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Cumberland, at the Angel in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of the originals in the Duke University, William R. Perkins Library Medical Center (reel 727), and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (reel 1755).

place.placeName: the Angel in St. Paul's Church-yard
